alert.note: Alert for Edwards; Real; Val Verde (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 27 at 4:56PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...An area of scattered, strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Kinney, northwestern Uvalde, Edwards, eastern Val Verde and western Real Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 453 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of scattered, strong thunderstorms across portions of northern Kinney, northwestern Uvalde, Edwards, eastern Val Verde and western Real Counties moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Del Rio, Rocksprings, Loma Alta, Camp Wood, Laguna, Barksdale, Vance, Amanda, Laughlin AFB, Montell, Val Verde Park, Alamo Village, Carta Valley, Standart, Kickapoo Cavern State Park, Us-277 Near The Sutton- Edwards County Line, Turkey Mountain, Devil`s Sinkhole State Natural Area, Vinegarone, and Escondido Estates. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
